item.title: Demo Environments and what I learned from implementing one
item.description: I got the task to implement a Demo environment, learned something about Laravel Factories and the usage of an environment to give possible customers / investors a taste of your product and the developers to find response time / query problems and UX bugs A “Demo” Feature Request #This card was proposed in a sprint planning and sparked a discussion around multiple problems and ideas.
